- in a CVS project, create a folder f1 and a folder f2 inside f1
- in the Synchronize view (change sets, compressed folders mode), select both f1 and f1/f2
- press Delete key and confirm dialog

Markus, am I missing something here?
I'm using I20070220-0800, and I can't delete from the Synchronize View.  Only "Remove from view"

That's why I wrote "press Delete key" and not "choose Delete" ;-)

For outgoing changes, Delete is not directly in the context menu. It's either
- main menu > Edit > Delete, or
- context menu > Edit > Delete.

Fixed in HEAD >20070308.
All other methods in ContainerDescription could handle null members, but one did not.  Updated method to check for null members.  

After fixing this, it's easier to run into a related bug, bug #176764.
Will treat that one separately.
verified WinXP, I20070320-0010, note that bug #176764 still exists.
